You step in the space at the end of the docks.Hundreds of fellow inmates are sitting around with trays.Looks like you've found the cafeteria[Angela]₿Gonna buy me a snack for my troubles? I definitely won't complain about an extra Neptune bar or two.[You]₿I was just hoping to kill some time(And find out what the charge ceremony is about)₽Get Angela a snack₼cafeteria-worker.txt₽Ask someone eating about their charge₼unfriendly.txt..
